name: Miner's Routine
description: A small game made for Ludum Dare 48 with the theme "Deeper and deeper". In this small adventure you have to take on the role of a miner, whose meaning of life is to dig in ores and minerals. He retired from his family for a short vacation in order to once again go down to excavations in his favorite business. Will he be able to develop his settlement and learn all the secrets of the mine? It only depends on you!
